TRANSLATION: (1) When the earth is shaken with its [final] earthquake
(2) And the earth discharges its burdens[1962]
(3) And man says,[1963] "What is [wrong] with it?" -
(4) That Day, it will report its news
(5) Because your Lord has inspired [i.e., commanded] it.

ARABIC_TEXT: يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَصۡدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشۡتَاتٗا لِّيُرَوۡاْ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ
TRANSLATION: (6) That Day, the people will depart[1964] separated [into categories] to be shown [the result of] their deeds.
FOOTNOTES: [1964]- From the place of Judgement to their final abode. Another interpretation is "emerge separately" (from the graves) .

ARABIC_TEXT: فَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيۡرٗا يَرَهُۥ
TRANSLATION: (7) So whoever does an atom's weight[1965] of good will see it,
FOOTNOTES: [1965]- Or "the weight of a small ant."

ARABIC_TEXT: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٖ شَرّٗا يَرَهُۥ
TRANSLATION: (8) And whoever does an atom's weight of evil will see it.
